template.name: Template App PHP-FPM
template.description: Metrics from php-fpm status page. More info: http://php.net/manual/en/install.fpm.configuration.php#pm.status-path

item.name: PHP-FPM ping
item.description: Time spent to ping PHP-FPM through /ping in milliseconds

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: content length (avg)
item.description: The average content length of last requests (checked for all PHP-FPM processes)

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: content length (max)
item.description: The maximum content length of last requests (checked for all PHP-FPM processes)

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: content length (min)
item.description: The minimum content length of last requests (checked for all PHP-FPM processes)

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: content length (total)
item.description: The sum of requests content length for all PHP-FPM processes

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: last request memory (avg)
item.description: The average of last requests memory for all PHP-FPM processes

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: last request memory (max)
item.description: The maximum of last requests memory for all PHP-FPM processes

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: last request memory (min)
item.description: The minimum of last requests memory for all PHP-FPM processes

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: last request memory (total)
item.description: The sum of last requests memory for all PHP-FPM processes

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: requests duration (avg)
item.description: The average of requests duration (in microseconds) for all PHP-FPM processes

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: requests duration (max)
item.description: The maximum of requests duration (in microseconds) for all PHP-FPM processes

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: requests duration (min)
item.description: The minimum of requests duration (in microseconds) for all PHP-FPM processes

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: requests duration (total)
item.description: The sum of requests duration (in microseconds) for all PHP-FPM processes

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: requests (avg)
item.description: The average of request number for all PHP-FPM processes

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: requests (max)
item.description: The maximum of request number for all PHP-FPM processes

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: requests (min)
item.description: The minimum of request number for all PHP-FPM processes

item.name: PHP-FPM processes: requests (total)
item.description: The sum of request for all PHP-FPM processes

item.name: PHP-FPM accepted connections
item.description: Number of requests accepted by the pool

item.name: PHP-FPM active processes
item.description: Number of active processes

item.name: PHP-FPM idle processes
item.description: Number of idle processes

item.name: PHP-FPM listen queue
item.description: Number of requests in the queue of pending connections

item.name: PHP-FPM listen queue length
item.description: Size of the socket queue of pending connections

item.name: PHP-FPM max active processes
item.description: Maximum number of active processes since FPM has started

item.name: PHP-FPM max children reached
item.description: Number of times the process limit has been reached, when pm tries to start more children (works only for pm ‘dynamic’ and ‘ondemand’)

item.name: PHP-FPM max listen queue
item.description: Maximum number of requests in the queue of pending connections since FPM has started

item.name: PHP-FPM pool name
item.description: Name of the pool used

item.name: PHP-FPM slow requests
item.description: Number of requests that exceeded your 'request_slowlog_timeout' value (counter)

item.name: PHP-FPM start since
item.description: Number of seconds since FPM has started

item.name: PHP-FPM total processes
item.description: Number of (idle + active) processes

item.name: PHP version
item.description: Full version of PHP from 'php --version'
